revision.text:
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Power Bangle |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from the front by 15%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 6730 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Power Bangle |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from the front by 17%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 6730 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Power Bangle |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt when attacking from the front by 19%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 6730 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Power Bangles''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They can be purchased at the [[Colony Iota Commissary]], they are one of the items that can be used to complete the mission ''[[Korresia Finds Her Calling]]''. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Power Belt |image = File:XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Increases Launch resistance by 50 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Power Belt |image = File:XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Increases Launch resistance by 55 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Power Belt |image = File:XC3 Accessory Belt.png |caption = Increases Launch resistance by 60 percentage points. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Power Belts''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Power Charge |image = XC3 Power Charge.png |type = Buff |base-duration = <abbr title="Lasts until affected character uses a damaging Art, is incapacitated, or the battle ends">Indefinite</abbr> |rng-applicable = Yes |effect-title-1 = Next Art Damage Bonus |effect-value-1 = 50% }} '''Power Charge''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It boosts the damage of the affected character's next Art.
== Notes == *Power Charge does not trigger upon a character's auto-attack, only when any Art that deals damage is used. Power Charge is also consumed on a character's Chain Art in a [[Chain Attack (XC3)|Chain Attack]], when their order is completed. *If the Art to be buffed by Power Charge is fused with another Art, both Arts will gain the bonuses of Power Charge. *The Power Charge's damage bonus is nearly independent of other damage bonuses, stacking additively only with [[Raging Force]], [[Element Genesis]], and [[Soulhacker#Enemy Skills|Accelerating Attacks]]'s damage bonuses.<ref>https://rocco.dev/blog/xenoblade-3-effects/</ref>
== Distribution == === Arts === *[[Cross Impact (XC3)|Cross Impact]] ([[Flash Fencer]]; applied only on hit) *[[Dragon Decree]] ([[Soulhacker]]; requires Soul Hacking [[Hardscale Gouran]]) *[[Toxic Gas]] (Soulhacker; requires Soul Hacking [[Spectral Rémy]]; applied only on hit) *[[Glorious Wing]] ([[Noah]]'s [[Ouroboros]]) *[[Saber Siege]] ([[Ashera]]'s [[Chain Attack (XC3)|Chain Order]]) *[[Galactic Flight]] ([[Fiona]]'s Chain Order) *[[Liberation Edge]] ([[Shulk]]'s Chain Order) ====In {{XC3FR|sub}}==== *[[Energy Boost]] and associated fusions ([[Matthew (FR)|Matthew]]) *Liberation Edge (Default completion bonus of Shulk's Chain Order) === Skills === * [[Soulhacker#Enemy Skills|Counter Puncher]] (Soulhacker, requires Soul Hacking [[Fang-King Clavein]]; chance-based trigger on evading)
=== Accessories === * [[Fighting Headband]] (chance-based trigger on evading)
====In {{XC3FR|sub}}==== The following [[Accessory (XC3)|Manuals]] grant Power Charge as part of the completion bonus during a Chain Attack: * [[Tactics Manual, vol. 14]] * [[Tactics Manual, vol. 18]] * [[Strategy Manual, vol. 9]] [[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}

{{Infobox item |name = Prayer Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Grants Armor Veil to revived allies. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 750 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Prayer Necklaces''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They can be purchased at the [[Colony 9 Commissary]], they are one of the items that can be used to complete the mission ''[[Korresia Finds Her Calling]]''. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox item |name = Predator Mask |image = |caption = Boosts damage dealt to Terrestrial Life by 110%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = [[Prize X-change Blue]] |sell = [[Gold|G]] }} '''Predator Masks''' are DLC [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. It can be purchased from [[Prize X-change Blue]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] for 6000 [[Noponstone]]s. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} C..."

revision.text:
{{Infobox quest |name = Primate Triumvirate |image = XC3 Challenge Battle Mode.png |description = "Bad news! Colony 5 occupied by humongous Gogols! And when say humongous, mean huge!" |giver = [[Nopon Archsage]] |location = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |prereqs = Main Story completed |difficultyCB3 = 5 |rewards = 1050-1500 [[Noponstone]]s (Easy)
2100-3000 [[Noponstone]]s (Normal)
3150-4500 [[Noponstone]]s (Hard) }} '''Primate Triumvirate''' is a Time Attack [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] in {{XC3}}. It can be received from [[Nopon Archsage]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]], available as downloadable content from the second part of the Expansion Pass. Clearing this challenge with at least an A rank for the first time will reward the player with an [[Accomplished Crown]]. == Challenge Rules == {| class="xc1" |Waves||3 |- |Level Restriction||Lv 99 |} == Enemies == {| class="xc1" !Wave !Enemy !Level |- | 1 || [[Impish Langobard]] || 105 |- | 2 || [[Jingoistic Gigantus]] || 100 |- | 3 || [[Immovable Gonzalez (XC3)|Immovable Gonzalez]] || 110 |} [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battles]]
